remarks:
The image of a set under any function is also a set.  Equivalent of Axiom of Replacement ~ ax-rep .  Axiom 39(vi) of [Quine] p. 284. Compare Exercise 9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 29.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2002.)
